com.foreach.across.core.context.module

Class AcrossModuleBootstrapConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.core.context.module.AcrossModuleBootstrapConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AcrossModuleConfiguration, MutableAcrossModuleConfiguration

    public class AcrossModuleBootstrapConfiguration
extends Object
implements MutableAcrossModuleConfiguration
    Represents the actual configuration that will be used to bootstrap a module. Internal to the framework, clients usually use either AcrossModuleConfiguration or MutableAcrossModuleConfiguration. Built from an AcrossModuleDescriptor using from(AcrossModuleDescriptor).

    Bootstrap configurations are considered equal if they are attached to an equal module descriptor. This is in line that there should be one bootstrap configuration per module descriptor. NOTE: not yet used.

    Since:
    5.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    ModuleBootstrapConfig
